title: Egg Cups And Stand, early 19th century
dimensions:
H x diam. (stand): 15.1 x 14.3 cm (5 15/16 x 5 5/8 in.)
H x diam. (cup): 7.1 x 4.4 cm (2 13/16 x 1 3/4 in.)
description: Circular stand with turned molded edge. Stand supported on three bun feet. Center of stand fitted with turned post, tapered toward globular finial.  Finial pierced with hole to accomodate double grip in the form of two extended arms. Stand fitted with three wooden posts, which fit into drilled holes in bottoms of individual egg cups. Curved, vase-shaped cups with molded circular bases, knop stem and molded lip.

tombstone.epitaph: Egg Cups And Stand, early 19th century.Mahogany, probable pear  beech (?). 1979-86-8-a/d.
